intro:
Stare closely and a hidden image will pop out!
Train your eyes and brain with mysterious stereograms
description:
When you cross your eyes and stare at the screen, a 3D image will pop out!
This is a fun brain-training game that uses mysterious stereograms.

How to play is simple：
・Read the question carefully
・Stare at the stereogram until the hidden image appears
・When you find the part that matches the answer, tap it!

Since it uses a lot of eye muscles, it’s a great way to train your vision effectively.

〜How to view stereograms〜
・Start by crossing your eyes
・When the two dots above the image appear as three, the hidden picture will emerge
・If you're not good at crossing your eyes, hold a finger in front of your eyes and focus on it
・Don't force it—just relax and let your eyes softly focus

※On the ""Setting"" screen at the start of the game, you can choose how to hold the device.
(In Table Mode or Handheld Mode, holding the device vertically makes the image easier to see.)
